PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionChamberElementTypeInspectionChamber
PropertySetDef.Definition: Chamber constructed on a drain, sewer or pipeline and with a removable cover, that permits visible inspection.

PropertyDef.Name: ChamberLengthOrRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: Length or, in the event of the shape being circular in plan, the radius of the chamber.

NameAliases.NameAlias: チャンバー（バイブスペース？）の長さあるいは半径

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: チャンバーの長さあるいは円形チャンバーの半径。
챔버의 길이 또는 원형 챔버의 반경

PropertyDef.Name: ChamberWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Width, in the event of the shape being non circular in plan.

NameAliases.NameAlias: チャンバー（バイブスペース？）の幅

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 非円形チャンバーの幅。
비원 챔버의 폭

PropertyDef.Name: InvertLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Level of the lowest part of the cross section as measured from ground level.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 断面の最も低い部分の深さ（地面から）。
단면의 가장 낮은 부분의 깊이 (지상에서)

PropertyDef.Name: SoffitLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Level of the highest internal part of the cross section as measured from ground level.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 断面の最も高い部分の深さ（地面から）。
단면의 가장 높은 부분의 깊이 (지상에서)

PropertyDef.Name: WallMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the wall of the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed of a single material.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクトスペース壁の材質。 注：ダクトスペースの壁は単層と仮定する
덕트 공간 벽의 재질 참고 : 덕트 공간의 벽은 단층 가정

PropertyDef.Name: WallThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the chamber wall construction NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed at a single thickness.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクトスペース壁の厚さ。 注：ダクトスペースの壁は単層と仮定する
덕트 공간 벽 두께 참고 : 덕트 공간의 벽은 단층 가정

PropertyDef.Name: BaseMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the base of the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber base will be constructed of a single material.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクトスペース床面の材質。 注：ダクトスペースの床は単層と仮定する
덕트 공간 바닥의 재질 참고 : 덕트 공간의 바닥은 단층 가정

PropertyDef.Name: BaseThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the chamber base construction NOTE: It is assumed that chamber base will be constructed at a single thickness.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクトスペース床面の厚さ。 注：ダクトスペースの床は単層と仮定する
덕트 공간 바닥의 두께 참고 : 덕트 공간의 바닥은 단층 가정

PropertyDef.Name: WithBackdrop
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the chamber has a backdrop or tumbling bay (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ダクトスペースはバックドロップ或いは堰付けかどうか（TRUE或いはFALSE）。
덕트 공간 백드롭 혹은 보 표시 여부 (TRUE 또는 FALSE)

PropertyDef.Name: AccessCoverMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the access cover to the chamber is constructed. NOTE: It is assumed that chamber walls will be constructed of a single material.

NameAliases.NameAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの材質

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの材質。 注：バイブスペースの壁は単層と仮定する
액세스 (체크) 커버의 재질 주 : 챔퍼 공간의 벽은 단층 가정

PropertyDef.Name: AccessLengthOrRadius
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the chamber access cover or, where the plan shape of the cover is circular, the radius.

NameAliases.NameAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの長さ或いは半径

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの長さ、或いは円形カバーの半径。
사용 (체크) 덮개 길이, 혹은 원형 커버 반경

PropertyDef.Name: AccessWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of the chamber access cover where the plan shape of the cover is not circular.

NameAliases.NameAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの幅

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの幅。
사용 (체크) 커버 폭

PropertyDef.Name: AccessCoverLoadRating
PropertyDef.Definition: The load rating of the access cover (which may be a value or an alphanumerically defined class rating).

NameAliases.NameAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの耐荷重

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: アクセス（点検）カバーの耐荷重（数字或いはアルファベットで定義する）。
사용 (체크) 커버 하중 (숫자 혹은 알파벳에서 정의됨)

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: 排水、下水管の上にある・点検用可移動カバー付けパイプスペース。
